LanguageData.ZP_Messtin.label: Mess Tin
LanguageData.ZP_Messtin.description: 【燃料:薪,木材,藁,モミガライト,炭】\nA tin used for cooking rice and other simple recipes. Mess Tins are just a step above cooking on a stick. This lack of confectionery tools leads to a 30% drop in Cooking speed.
LanguageData.ZP_Messtin_Blueprint.label: Mess Tin (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Messtin_Blueprint_Install.label: Mess Tin (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Messtin_Frame.label: Mess Tin (building)
LanguageData.ZP_Messtin_Frame.description: 【燃料:薪,木材,藁,モミガライト,炭】\nA tin used for cooking rice and other simple recipes. Mess Tins are just a step above cooking on a stick. This lack of confectionery tools leads to a 30% drop in Cooking speed.
